EmailTemplate.name: Expense Status is Submitted - Email to Resource
EmailTemplate.subject: Expense Report is Submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Expense__c.Resource__c},
Your Expense {!Expense__c.Name} for {!Expense__c.Expense_Type__c} for the amount of {!Expense__c.Expense_Amount__c} for the date
{!Expense__c.Expense_Date__c} has been submitted for reimbursement.
Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
